Key Match Events: Hemaloto Polovili scored a penalty to double Tonga's lead
Taci Kumsuz scored for Cook Islands to half the deficit
Christopher Kefu scored a crucial third goal for Tonga
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tonga's physicality made life difficult for Cook Islands
Others: Tonga advanced to the final match in Round One of the FIFA World Cup 2026 Oceania Qualifiers
Tonga will face the winner of the match between American Samoa and Samoa on Monday to determine who will advance to the group stages of round two next month
